vote.title: Re-appointment of Lark T. Mallory JD, with the Columbus and Franklin County Affordable Housing Trust, 175 South 3rd Street #1060, Columbus, OH 43215, to continue serving on the RiverSouth Development Authority Board of Directors, with a new term expiration date of June 22, 2024 (resume attached).
vote.description:
Title
Re-appointment of Lark T. Mallory JD, with the Columbus and Franklin County Affordable Housing Trust, 175 South 3rd Street #1060, Columbus, OH 43215, to continue serving on the RiverSouth Development Authority Board of Directors, with a new term expiration date of June 22, 2024 (resume attached).
